select a.SAL_ID,a.SAL_USER,c.EMP_NAME as SAL_NAME,a.SAL_YEAR,a.SAL_MONTH,a.SAL_VALID_DAYS,a.SAL_WORK_DAYS, a.SAL_OVERTIME,a.SAL_LEAVE,a.SAL_BASIC,a.SAL_PERFORMANCE, a.SAL_SUBSIDY,a.SAL_BONUS,a.SAL_TOTAL,a.SAL_STATE,a.SAL_INSURE,a.SAL_TAX,SAL_REMARKS, (a.SAL_TOTAL-a.SAL_INSURE-a.SAL_TAX) as SAL_ACTUAL,CONCAT(a.SAL_YEAR,'-',a.SAL_MONTH) as SAL_YEAR_MONTH from hr_salary a LEFT JOIN security_user b ON a.SAL_USER=b.USER_ID LEFT JOIN hr_employee c ON b.USER_CODE=c.EMP_CODE where 1=1
and SAL_YEAR = #salYear#
and SAL_MONTH = #salMonth#
and SAL_STATE = #salState#
and a.SAL_USER = #currentUserCode#
order by b.USER_CODE,SAL_YEAR desc,SAL_MONTH desc

select a.SAL_ID,a.SAL_USER,c.EMP_NAME as SAL_NAME,a.SAL_YEAR,a.SAL_MONTH,a.SAL_VALID_DAYS,a.SAL_WORK_DAYS, a.SAL_OVERTIME,a.SAL_LEAVE,a.SAL_BASIC,a.SAL_PERFORMANCE, a.SAL_SUBSIDY,a.SAL_BONUS,a.SAL_TOTAL,a.SAL_STATE,a.SAL_INSURE,a.SAL_TAX,SAL_REMARKS, (a.SAL_TOTAL-SAL_INSURE-SAL_TAX) as SAL_ACTUAL from hr_salary a LEFT JOIN security_user b ON a.SAL_USER=b.USER_ID LEFT JOIN hr_employee c ON b.USER_CODE=c.EMP_CODE where 1=1

SELECT USER_ID,COUNT(ATD_DATE) as WORK_DAYS FROM hr_attendance WHERE 1=1
and USER_ID = #userCode#
and LEFT(ATD_DATE,7) = #yearMonth#
GROUP BY USER_ID

SELECT USER_ID,SUM(LEA_DAYS) as LEAVE_DAYS FROM hr_leave WHERE 1=1
and USER_ID = #userCode#
and LEFT(LEA_SDATE,7) = #yearMonth#
GROUP BY USER_ID

SELECT USER_ID,SUM(WOT_TIME) as WOT_DAYS FROM hr_work_overtime WHERE 1=1
and USER_ID = #userCode#
and LEFT(WOT_DATE,7) = #yearMonth#
GROUP BY USER_ID
